body_html:
@drpngx thanks for you attention!
I have use the tf.estimator.Estimator defined a group of models, and trained a subset of them.
After that, I want to use those trained model's Parameter to init the last un-trained model's parameter, and then start to train this last model.
I find way's to get the older trained model's paramter by tf.estimator.Estimator.get_variable_value(name), but don't have a set var 's value's API to init the last un-trainded model's Parameter by the get_variable_value()'s Tensors.
Can you give me some advice about the set var's value's API ?
Thanks again!

body:
@drpngx  thanks for you attention!
I have use the tf.estimator.Estimator defined a group of models, and trained a subset of them. 
After that, I want to use those trained model's Parameter to init the last un-trained model's parameter, and then start to train this last model. 
I find way's to get the older trained model's paramter by  tf.estimator.Estimator.get_variable_value(name),  but  don't have a set var 's value's API to  init the last un-trainded model's Parameter  by the get_variable_value()'s Tensors.
Can you give me some advice about the  set var's value's API ? 
Thanks again!
